name: Rocky Mountain Altitude Powerplay C70 Shimano XT 12V 720Wh 27.5''/29'' Noir Rouge 2023
description: Conçu avec notre système de motorisation Dyname 4.0, l'Altitude Powerplay a tout ce dont vous avez besoin pour des sorties d'enduro électrifiées.

châssis.cadre: SMOOTHWALL™ Carbon | Integrated Display | Mid-High Pivot Smoothlink Suspension System | Press Fit BB | RIDE-4™ Adjustable Geometry + Suspension Rate | 160mm Travel. FORM™ Alloy Rear Triangle
châssis.fourche: Fox 38 Float EVOL GRIP Performance Series 170mm | 44mm Offset
châssis.amortisseur: Fox Float X2 Performance | Sealed Bearing Eyelet | 25x8mm F Hardware | All Sizes = 230x62.5mm | Size-Specific tune in FAQ

assistance électrique.moteur: Dyname 4.0 Mountain Bike Drive | 250w Nominal Power | 108Nm | Rocky Mountain Micro Remote | Low RPM - High Efficiency class 1 eMTB System | Designed in Canada
assistance électrique.écran: Rocky Mountain Jumbotron | Drive System Customization | Battery & Assist Level | Trip | Speed | Cadence | Top Tube Integration
assistance électrique.batterie: 720 Wh Removable Integrated Li-Ion | 100% Charged in 3:55 (4A) / 7:35 (2A) | 80% Charged in 2:55 (4A) / 6:05 (2A)

transmission.pédalier: Race Face Aeffect Cinch 34T | 24mm Spindle | Crank Length: SM - MD = 165mm | LG - XL = 170mm

équipements.freins: Shimano XT Trail 4 Piston | Metal Pads | F:Shimano RT66 203mm | R:Shimano RT66 203mm
équipements.tige de selle: Race Face Aeffect R Dropper 30.9mm | Shimano MT500 Remote | SM = 125mm | MD = 150mm | LG - XL = 175mm

roues.jantes: WTB ST i30 TCS 2.0 Tubeless | 32H | Tubeless Ready - Tape / Valves Incl | Cushcore XC Tire Inserts | Lightweight | Tire & Rim Protection
roues.pneus: F: Maxxis Assegai 2.5 WT 3C MaxxGrip DD Tubeless Ready // R: Maxxis Minion DHR II 2.4 WT 3C MaxxTerra DD Tubeless Ready

direction.potence: Rocky Mountain 35 AM | 5° Rise | All Sizes = 40m
